channel.title: Comments on: Version 1.19.3
channel.description: Brings your projects to your pocket

item.title: By: Valerio Mazzeo
item.dc:creator: Valerio Mazzeo
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-110">Benjamin Behr</a>.
Apple doesn't allow to choose what language the app is on, unless you switch your phone's language from Spanish to English.
Is there anything in the Spanish translation that doesn't make sense?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Benjamin Behr.

Apple doesn’t allow to choose what language the app is on, unless you switch your phone’s language from Spanish to English.

Is there anything in the Spanish translation that doesn’t make sense?

item.title: By: Benjamin Behr
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Behr
item.description: Thanks for the update. I like the spanish translation but how do I switch back to english?
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the update. I like the spanish translation but how do I switch back to english?
